title: Metamucil Fiber Gummies Orange
description: Shop Fiber Gummies Orange and read reviews at Walgreens. Pickup & Same Day Delivery available on most store items.
cleaned_text: Fiber Gummies Orange72.0ea How would you like to receive this item ? Description Did you know only 10% of Americans get the recommended daily amount of dietary fiber in their diets? Metamucil Gummies fiber supplement are an easy and delicious way to increase your daily fiber intake to help support your digestive health*. Metamucil Fiber Gummies are formulated for adults and come in a delicious orange flavor. They are made with a prebiotic, plant-based fiber blend, all with no sugar added. Getting more fiber in your diet has never been easier than with Metamucil Fiber Gummies - taking just three delicious Metamucil Fiber Gummies adds 5 g of fiber to your diet. Try them today! Metamucil Fiber Gummies are from the makers of the #1 selling fiber supplement brand^. Metamucil Fiber Gummies are from the #1 selling fiber supplement brand^. The Metamucil family of products include Powders, Capsules, Powder Packets, Fiber Thins, and Gummies. *THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION. THIS PRODUCT IS NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, TREAT, CURE, OR PREVENT ANY DISEASE. ^Procter & Gamble calculation based in part on data reported by NielsenIQ through its ScanTrack Service for the Fiber Supplements (branded only) for the 52-weeks period ending 04/09/22, for the Total U.S. Market xAOC, according to the NielsenIQ standard product hierarchy. Made in United States of America For ages 12 and up. 1 Gummy = Nice and Easy! 2 Gummies = Double Down!! 3 Gummies = Fiber Up!!! (One Full Serving). Up to 3 servings/day. Do not exceed recommended serving. NEW USERS: Start with 1-3 gummies per day; gradually increase to desired daily intake. You may experience changes in bowel habits / minor bloating, as your body adjusts to increased fiber intake. © Procter & Gamble [Show More](javascript:void(0)) Product Specifications IngredientsInulin, Soluble Less than 2% of:, Pectin, Citric Acid (Ph Adjuster), Sodium Citrate, Natural Orange Flavor, Coconut Oil With Carnauba Wax, Color (Annatto) Nutrition FactsServing Size 3 gummiesServings Per Container 24 Nutritional Information % Daily Value Sodium 20mg 1% Total Carbohydrate 10g 4% Dietary fiber 5g 18% Calories 25 Total Sugars 2g Includes Added Sugars 0g Warnings Keep out of reach of children. Consult a physician if you are taking any prescription medications or are pregnant/breastfeeding.
